Jim, Gordon, Alan et.al.;  do you know if the book(s) 'Kogai', 'Ko 
Kogai' =
and 'Furukogai' are one in the same?  I have been reading some 
description=
s from the Sotheby London 9 November 2004 catalog and they 
list 'Furukogai=
' and 'Ko Kogai' as well as the 'Mitokoro Shu' by Ikeda 
which I already ha=
ve.  I have been attempting to find research books on 
kogai and, although =
I know they are all difficult to locate, it would 
be of great help knowing=
 if there is actually more than one book to be 
looking for.
Thanks as alwa=
ys!
